tasks.title: Test mobile responsiveness on real devices
tasks.description: Test OSYS on iPhone, Android, and tablets. Document any layout issues, text overflow, or touch targets that are too small.
tasks.expectedOutput: List of responsive issues with screenshots

tasks.title: Research competitor pricing
tasks.description: Analyze TeamSnap, SportsEngine, GameChanger pricing pages. Document tiers, features per tier, and positioning.

tasks.title: Recruit beta coaches
tasks.description: Reach out to 10 youth sports coaches to be beta testers. Focus on football and basketball initially.
tasks.expectedOutput: List of confirmed beta testers with contact info

tasks.title: Set up Stripe integration
tasks.description: Create Stripe account, get API keys, test payment flow in sandbox mode.
tasks.expectedOutput: Stripe API keys and test transaction confirmation

tasks.title: Analyze App Store reviews
tasks.description: Run review scraper on TeamSnap and GameChanger to identify pain points.
tasks.result: Top complaints: slow load times, confusing UI, expensive pricing
